size.description: Use the size prop to change the size of the chip.
size.description_zh: Use the size prop to change the size of the chip.

position.description: Use the position prop to change the position of the chip.
position.description_zh: Use the position prop to change the position of the chip.

color.description: Use the color prop to change the color of the chip.
color.description_zh: Use the color prop to change the color of the chip.

text.description: Use the text prop to display text in the chip.
text.description_zh: Use the text prop to display text in the chip.

inset.description: Use the inset prop to display the chip inside the component. This is useful when dealing with rounded components.
inset.description_zh: Use the inset prop to display the chip inside the component. This is useful when dealing with rounded components.

show.description: Use the show prop to conditionally display the chip.
show.description_zh: Use the show prop to conditionally display the chip.

slots.name: content
slots.description: Use the #content slot to fully customize the chip.
slots.description_zh: 使用#content插槽完全自定义芯片。
